welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Scituate, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, historic lighthouse, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our town has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing luxurious amenities and services for passengers and crew.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provincetown Airport provides all necessary services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or chartered planes, there is a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
